text: I'm Gonna Go Out SWINGING!!! Toy Soldiers, Dipping Dots Fun Sized BARRRSS!!! Slipping Slides, Fart Noises, CHICKEN STARS!!!

Leo is a Sandler movie through and through with his usual humor, and cast, but this time for the whole family. The music is good, the cast is great, and has plenty of humor, and is overall a sweet movie.
We watched it because of the Chicken stars.
I'm gonna go out SWINGIN'. Toy soldiers, Dippin' Dots, fun sized baaaars. Slip'n'slides, fart noises, CHICKEN STARS
I hated it. not good.
Chicken Stars.

A very wonderful movie for kids and adults. Great plot and voice actors. This is a great movie for children to learn that no matter what you are going through, there is always someone who is willing to listen to you. The directions were great. One of Adam Sandler's best movies.
Uma animação divertida, até que gostei assistir e algumas piadas são legais, o porém que é um filme estranho e tem um Musical duvidoso, mas Adam Sandler consegue entregar algo legal

If you’re a kid, teenager, or even an adult, I’m pretty sure you’ll love this movie. Everybody is different in different ways, and that’s Ok. This is what happens in Leo. It’s also pretty rough when you’re in 5th grade and your moving on to Middle School. I remember when I was going to Middle School, I was a bit nervous, but after a couple of weeks, I got used to it. I’m sure teenagers and adults are gonna remember how it felt like going on to Middle School if they see this movie. Except, there are some adult jokes that seem inappropriate for kids, and I’m not really sure how to feel about all the pop culture references. But it’s still a good movie!
This was a fun movie, with sometimes almost realistic textures, like on the chicken nuggets early in the movie.
Leo (2023) is a classroom lizard who plays psychologist to help children face their fears and conflicts, this seems to be quite interesting to follow.
one of the best movies ive seen

This film is very beautiful. It truly encourages us to put ourselves in other people's shoes, to find humility and friendship, not just among friends but also among teachers, as it shows us that, like us, they struggle greatly to make their classes the best they can be. A film that blends humor and reflection.
Saian Popayán
I love the humor in its length of 1hour and 46 minutes, Rated PG for Rude/Suggestive Material and Some Language!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
Leo was a good film however it had too many songs.

I liked this movie, but my sister was addicted to it for like 2 years, and because of that, it got old and kinda ruined it a bit for me. But before that’s happened, I would have probably given it a 4/5. So that’s what I’ll go with.
Excellent movie! Perfect for children, adults, and as a family. You will be laughing throughout the whole movie! I highly recommend that you see this movie. You'll love it!
Adam sandler as Leo is funny

We originally watched this because it was only marketed as a family and comedy movie, and we wanted to watch something with our 9 year old sister. And it was, but my 50 year old mom, 15 year old sister, the 9 year old sister, and me(19 year old lad) thought it was absolutely hilarious. We all laughed so hard throughout the whole movie. The attention to detail in this movie was phenomenal and it really was one of the best movies I have seen in a while. There were a few scenes and dialogue that were a little questionable in a kids movie, but it really was pretty clean and family friendly. Would definitely watch again.
Though it has forgettable songs, Leo is a warm and wholehearted animated film.
